message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for a competitive price of $120. I believe it offers great value, even at this price.
Alice, thanks for the offer, but $120 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay. I'm interested in this product, but I can only go up to $85. What do you think?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While that's a bit lower than I was hoping for, I could be persuaded to go down to $105.
Alice,  $105 is still a bit too high for me. I'm really keen on getting this product, but I can't go above $90. If you're willing to come down to that price, we have a deal.
